name: The Mutation
description:
Since the jam have began , some people have mutated . Use your new power to find them and eliminate the threat . Control :

Move Character = WASD

Run = Shift

Jump = Space Bar

Roll = Q

Crouch = C

Open Parachute = Space Bar

Shot = Left Mouse

Menu : Press ESC to see the menu Credits :

Alexander  Bonesteele  Programmer

Bryan Davis  Music Artist

Steve Messier  Character Artist/GameDev Game Instrutions :  Aim at the Enemy(Aiming will read the mind) to find the Mutants and kill them . If you kill 3 Civilians you Loose. Kill 7 Mutants and 3 boss to Win!!! Downloads and Links MediaFire Version 1.01 February 20 2022  Microsoft Windows https://www.mediafire.com/file/li7tueajh402jpk/TheMutationV1.01.7z/file
